IP.Name: SubGHz_Phy
IP.About: Middleware enabling LoRa, (G)FSK, (G)MSK and BPSK modulations.

RefParameter.Name: SUBGHZ_APPLICATION
RefParameter.Description: List of available applications

RefParameter.Name: USE_LPM
RefParameter.Description: Allow pre-fill of stm32_lpm_if.c file.

RefParameter.Name: USE_RTC
RefParameter.Description:
RTC: Proposed solution to manage timer in Low Power mode.
   • For Dual Core operation Runtime Contexts are both Cortex-M4 and Cortex-M0+ and initializer is Cortex-M0+
Modes: Activate Clock Source, Activate Calendar and activate Alarm A (and B for Dual Core) (Internal Alarm A (and B for Dual Core))
User Constants: Add the following Constants
   • Constant Name: RTC_N_PREDIV_S Value: 10
   • Constant Name: RTC_PREDIV_S Value: ((1 << RTC_N_PREDIV_S)-1)
   • Constant Name: RTC_PREDIV_A Value: ((1 << (15-RTC_N_PREDIV_S))-1)
Configuration - Parameters Settings:
   • Asynchronous Predivider value: Set value to RTC_PREDIV_A
   • Bin Mode: Free running Binary mode
   • Alarm A Binary AutoControl: RTC_ALARMSUBSECONDBIN_AUTOCLR_NO
Configuration - NVIC settings:
   • Enable both Interrupts

SubGHz_Phy - Platform Settings panel: Platform proposals
   • Ensure that RTC is selected in Found Solutions

RefParameter.Name: USE_UART
RefParameter.Description:
USART/LPUART: Proposed solution to manage trace.
   • For Dual Core operation Runtime Context is Cortex-M4
Modes: Asynchronous
Configuration - Parameters Settings:
   • If LPUART is selected then set Baud Rate: 9600 Bits/s
Configuration - DMA Settings:
   • Add USARTx_TX DMA Request with Channel configured with DMA1 Channel 5
Configuration - NVIC settings:
   • Enable both Interrupts
Clock Configuration panel
   • If LPUART is selected then set Clock Mux to LSE
NVIC Mode and Configuration panel - Preemption priority management
   • Set preemption Priority for DMA and UART Interrupt to 2

SubGHz_Phy - Platform Settings panel: Platform proposals
   • Ensure that chosen UART is selected in Found Solutions

RefParameter.Name: USER_GUIDANCE
RefParameter.DefaultValue: !! Please read carefully Information panel below!!
RefParameter.Description:
RCC: Proposed solution to manage RCC.
Modes: Low Speed Clock (LSE): Set value to Crystal Ceramic Resonator
Configuration - Parameters Settings:
   • Flash Latency(WS): 2 WS (3 CPU cycle)
   • Power Regulator Voltage Scale: Scale 1
Clock Configuration panel
   • Set MSI RC to 32MHz
   • Set RTC Clock Mux to LSE

Project Manager- Advanced Settings panel: Generated Function Calls management
   • Untick "Generate Code" for RTC on CortexM4 and DMA on CortexM0PLUS for Dual Core
   • Tick "Do Not Generate Function Call" for DMA, RTC, SUBGHZ, UART and IPCC(for Dual Core)
   • Untick Visibility for all Function Calls on both cores

RefParameter.Name: USER_GUIDANCE
RefParameter.DefaultValue: !! Please read carefully Information panel below!!
RefParameter.Description:
RCC: Proposed solution to manage RCC.
Modes: Low Speed Clock (LSE): Set value to Crystal Ceramic Resonator
Configuration - Parameters Settings:
   • Flash Latency(WS): 2 WS (3 CPU cycle)
   • Power Regulator Voltage Scale: Scale 1
Clock Configuration panel
   • Set MSI RC to 32MHz
   • Set RTC Clock Mux to LSE


RTC: Proposed solution to manage timer in Low Power mode.
   • For Dual Core operation Runtime Contexts are both Cortex-M4 and Cortex-M0+ and initializer is Cortex-M0+
Modes: Activate Clock Source, Activate Calendar and activate Alarm A (and B for Dual Core) (Internal Alarm A (and B for Dual Core))
User Constants: Add the following Constants
   • Constant Name: RTC_N_PREDIV_S Value: 10
   • Constant Name: RTC_PREDIV_S Value: ((1 << RTC_N_PREDIV_S)-1)
   • Constant Name: RTC_PREDIV_A Value: ((1 << (15-RTC_N_PREDIV_S))-1)
Configuration - Parameters Settings:
   • Asynchronous Predivider value: Set value to RTC_PREDIV_A
   • Bin Mode: Free running Binary mode
   • Alarm A Binary AutoControl: RTC_ALARMSUBSECONDBIN_AUTOCLR_NO
Configuration - NVIC settings:
   • Enable both Interrupts

USART/LPUART: Proposed solution to manage trace.
   • For Dual Core operation: Runtime Contexts is Cortex-M4
Modes: Asynchronous
Configuration - Parameters Settings:
   • If LPUART is selected then set Baud Rate: 9600 Bits/s
Configuration - DMA Settings:
   • Add USARTx_TX DMA Request with Channel configured with DMA1 Channel 5
Configuration - NVIC settings:
   • Enable both Interrupts
Clock Configuration panel
   • If LPUART is selected then set Clock Mux to LSE
NVIC Mode and Configuration panel - Preemption priority management
   • Set preemption Priority for DMA and UART Interrupt to 2

Project Manager- Advanced Settings panel: Generated Function Calls management
   • Untick "Generate Code" for RTC on CortexM4 for Dual Core if you decide to use RTC for Timer and DMA on CortexM0PLUS for Dual Core
   • Tick "Do Not Generate Function Call" for DMA, RTC, SUBGHZ, UART and IPCC(for Dual Core)
   • Untick Visibility for all Function Calls on both cores

RefParameter.Name: LOW_POWER_DISABLE
RefParameter.Description: It goes only to SLEEP but not to STOP mode

RefParameter.Name: LOW_POWER_DISABLE
RefParameter.Description: It goes only to SLEEP but not to STOP mode

RefParameter.Name: LOW_POWER_DISABLE_CM4
RefParameter.Description: It goes only to SLEEP but not to STOP mode

RefParameter.Name: LOW_POWER_DISABLE_CM4
RefParameter.Description: It goes only to SLEEP but not to STOP mode

RefParameter.Name: LOW_POWER_DISABLE_CM0PLUS
RefParameter.Description: It goes only to SLEEP but not to STOP mode

RefParameter.Name: LOW_POWER_DISABLE_CM0PLUS
RefParameter.Description: It goes only to SLEEP but not to STOP mode

RefParameter.Name: Activate_DEBUG_LINE
RefParameter.Description: Enable Probe Line using GPIO under Plaform Settings panel

RefParameter.Name: Activate_DEBUG_LINE
RefParameter.Description: Enable Probes Line using GPIO under Plaform Settings panel

RefParameter.Name: RF_WAKEUP_TIME
RefParameter.Description: Radio maximum wakeup time (in ms)

RefParameter.Name: Activate_RADIO_BOARD_INTERFACE
RefParameter.Description: UserBoard: user to complete; Bsp: need to be included in the IDE.

RefParameter.Name: IS_TCXO_SUPPORTED
RefParameter.Description: Indicates whether or not TCXO is supported by the board. TCXO needs to be selected in RCC panel (HSE clock)

RefParameter.Name: IS_TCXO_SUPPORTED
RefParameter.Description: You need to activate TCXO in RCC configuration panel

RefParameter.Name: IS_DCDC_SUPPORTED
RefParameter.Description: Indicates whether or not DCDC is supported by the board

RefParameter.Name: TX_RFO_CONFIG
RefParameter.Description: Indicates the config

RefParameter.Name: Activate_BOARD_RESOURCES
RefParameter.Description: Enable LEDs and BUTTONs settings using GPIO under Plaform Settings panel

RefParameter.Name: Activate_BOARD_RESOURCES
RefParameter.Description: Enable LEDs and BUTTONs settings using GPIO under Plaform Settings panel or via .extSettings file

BspDependency.Comment: Use the User Led for this application

BspDependency.Name: USART
BspDependency.Comment: Use an USART or LPUART for this application

Condition.Expression: ((STM32WL55UCYx | STM32WL55CCUx | STM32WL55JCIx | STM32WL54CCUx | STM32WL54JCIx) & !S_LoRaWAN & !S_Sigfox & S_SUBGHZ & S_IPCC_Enabled & !S_SINGLE_CORE) | ((STM32WL55UCYx | STM32WL55CCUx | STM32WL55JCIx | STM32WL54CCUx | STM32WL54JCIx) & !S_LoRaWAN & !S_Sigfox & S_SUBGHZ & S_SINGLE_CORE) | ((!STM32WL55UCYx & !STM32WL55CCUx & !STM32WL55JCIx & !STM32WL54CCUx & !STM32WL54JCIx) & !S_LoRaWAN & !S_Sigfox & S_SUBGHZ)
Condition.Diagnostic: You can enable this middleware only if only if SubGHz IP is enabled and LoRaWAN and Sigfox middlewares are not enabled. For Dual Core product you need also to activate IPCC
